entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 2:37 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 32 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
